sections.title: Why build your own tic-tac-toe game?
sections.content:
In a world saturated with generic apps, creating your own polished game offers a unique edge. Kliv empowers you to go beyond basic tutorials and build a truly engaging experience, fast. While existing game templates often limit creativity and ownership, a custom-built game ensures you control every pixel and every line of code.

This isn't just about recreating a classic; it's about learning the fundamentals of real-time application development, user management, and game logic in a practical, fun context. Whether for a portfolio, a community project, or just personal satisfaction, building your own game gives you full control and valuable insights into interactive app design.

sections.title: The case for custom game development
sections.content:
## Beyond the basic tutorial

Many online tutorials or pre-made solutions for tic-tac-toe focus only on the single-player, client-side experience. But what if you want more? What if you want to:

- **Host real-time matches** between friends or strangers?
- **Implement a robust backend** for user accounts and leaderboards?
- **Control the monetization** or feature set without limitations?
- **Explore advanced game mechanics** like power-ups or different board sizes?

Generic solutions or simple code snippets fall short. They don't typically offer:

- **Scalability**: What if 100 or 1000 players want to play simultaneously?
- **Persistence**: How do you save user preferences or game history?
- **Customization**: Can you easily change the UI, rules, or add unique features?
- **Ownership**: You often don't own the underlying infrastructure or all the code.

## Why custom-built is the smart choice

Building with Kliv means you're creating a robust, full-stack application, not just a front-end demo. Here's why that's a game-changer:

### True Real-time Interaction
Leverage backend capabilities for persistent connections, ensuring smooth, low-latency gameplay that feels responsive and alive.

### Complete Control Over Features
Add a public or private lobby, custom win conditions, chat functionality, spectator modes, or even integrate NFTs for game assets. If you can imagine it, you can build it.

### Scalable Infrastructure
Your game can handle a growing number of players without constant refactoring. Kliv's platform supports scalable architectures from the start.

### Full Data Ownership
Maintain complete control over player data, game statistics, and any other information generated by your application. Perfect for privacy-conscious projects or future data analysis.

## Real-world applications

The principles of building a multiplayer tic-tac-toe game extend far beyond. You're learning to build the backbone for:

**Educational Games**: Interactive quizzes or collaborative learning tools with real-time feedback.

**Competitive Platforms**: Simple esports tournaments or mini-game challenges for online communities.

**Social Interactions**: Integrating gaming elements into social apps to increase engagement and retention.

**Prototype Development**: Rapidly test new game mechanics or user interaction ideas before investing in complex engines.

## The AI advantage

Developing a complex, real-time application used to require deep expertise in backend, frontend, and database management. Kliv simplifies this:

- **Natural language to code**: Describe game rules, lobby logic, or user authentication in plain English.
- **Rapid iteration**: See your game mechanics come to life instantly, allowing for quick testing and refinement.
- **Backend automation**: AI handles the heavy lifting of server setup, database configuration, and API generation.
- **Deployment readiness**: Your application is built for deployment, not just local testing, meaning it's ready for users.

## Getting started

Stop wishing you could build a 'real' game. With Kliv, you can. It's an ideal project for understanding the full scope of application development from game logic to user management. Dive in and redefine what a simple game can be.

items.answer: With Kliv, you can have a basic playable multiplayer tic-tac-toe game up and running in a few hours. Adding advanced features like leaderboards or custom rules might extend it to a few days for a full-featured application.
items.question: How quickly can I build a playable game?

items.answer: No, you don't need prior game development or backend coding experience. Kliv's AI handles the complex aspects of real-time communication, database management, and server logic, allowing you to focus on game design.
items.question: Do I need to be a seasoned game developer?

items.answer: Yes, your game will be fully scalable. Kliv's underlying infrastructure is designed to automatically handle increased user loads, ensuring your game performs well whether you have 10 or 10,000 concurrent players.
items.question: Can my game handle many concurrent players?

items.answer: You own 100% of the game logic, UI, and data. Kliv provides the development platform, but the intellectual property of your creation belongs entirely to you. You can export your code and deploy it anywhere.
items.question: Who owns the game I build on Kliv?

items.answer: Kliv gives you complete control. You can integrate any advertising networks, create in-app purchases for cosmetic items, or implement subscription models. There are no platform-imposed restrictions on your monetization strategy.
items.question: Can I monetize my game?

items.answer: Absolutely. You can easily modify existing rules, add new game modes, change the board size, introduce power-ups, or integrate entirely new features as your vision evolves. The flexibility is a core advantage.
items.question: Is it easy to update or add new features later?

items.answer: Yes. Real-time games require reliable backend infrastructure. Kliv handles this by generating robust, secure backend code and APIs, managing data storage, and providing real-time communication layers, so your game functions perfectly.
items.question: Will my game have a stable backend for real-time play?
